body.name: LENREU F62 Portable Bluetooth Speaker with Bluetooth 5.3, RGB Lights, Stereo Sound & bass, Compact Size, IPX5 Waterproof, Lightweight Travel Speaker for Car Bicycle Bag and More Outdoor

features: [RGB Colorful Light Show]: Vibrant RGB lights, immersive sound, and customizable settings. Elevate your music experience with dynamic lighting, adjustable effects, and easy on/off controls. Perfect for bringing life to any gathering or enhancing your daily routine.

[Hi-Fi Stereo Sound and Dual Pairing Function] : A portable speaker with Hi-Fi stereo sound provides excellent audio quality. The dual pairing function lets you connect two speakers for a wider stereo effect. Enjoy immersive sound and amplify your music at parties or gatherings.

[Upgraded Bluetooth 5.3 Signal]:Experience upgraded connectivity with our speaker's Bluetooth 5.3 signal. Enjoy seamless pairing and enhanced audio performance. Stay connected and indulge in high-quality sound wirelessly. Elevate your music experience with our advanced Bluetooth technology. Upgrade to the latest Bluetooth 5.3 signal for a superior wireless audio experience.

[Waterproof, Dust-proof, and Slip-proof ]:Take your music anywhere with confidence. Our speaker is waterproof, dust-proof, and slip-proof, making it perfect for any adventure. Whether you're by the pool, hiking, or on the go, our durable design ensures uninterrupted music enjoyment in any condition. Elevate your outdoor entertainment with our reliable and versatile speaker.

[Portable and Exquisite] : Take your music with you wherever you go, thanks to its compact size and lightweight design. With its sleek and stylish appearance, it adds a touch of elegance to any setting. Enjoy your favorite tunes on the move with this portable and exquisitely crafted speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's very beautiful and amazing and the volume is very efficient I love the way how the LED glowing colored lights change with the music that you play and overall an amazing display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked at the sound quality out of the box bluetooth signal from a cell phone at near CD playback quality without any EQ adjustments and I am an Audiophile,.. It's a little large for being labeled as small but it's quality, the colors are cool easy to set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This speaker is absolutely awesome! It’s small and easy to carry, but it actually produces bass which is not common in these smaller more affordable speakers. I use this one at the office to drown out other conversations being had within the building and it’s just perfect. What’s even better is that it sounds good and loud in my office but it cannot be heard outside my door. (Our office walls are very much thin and you can hear everything, hence why I got it)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for on the go music
reviews.reviewText: Easy to pair and get going, very nice clip on ring to attach to you bag for on the go. Gets pretty loud but try to be mindful of those around you, nobody wants to hear your random music while out in nature no matter how refined you think your tastes are. If you're having a BBQ in the park or at the pool or something, go nuts, its already loud there anyway. If you're hiking in a spot with lots of foot traffic, turn that down enough to just be in range for your group. Same if you're at a busy beach. Show come courtesy with this thing because no one wants to hear your music nor do I want everyone to hear me playing the Austin Powers theme song on repeat Groovy baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and portable easy you need to keep with you.
reviews.reviewText: Sound is all right but wish it was just a little bit less staticky, and maybe another hour or two battery life but for the size it's all right. Not that expensive so I got 2 to extend the battery life or ever mini stereo because they link into stereo mode. If I want to extend battery life for a mini stereo I have to get two more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can't believe the sound from this!!!
reviews.reviewText: So portable! So CUTE! I didn't expect the sound to be this loud, clear, and NOT distorted for this price. A must-have for any outing. Can't wait to bring this little piece of wonderfulness to the beach this summer!This would make a great gift for any occasion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Way better product then i expected for 12 dollars sound quality is great and the lights on it are a very cool feature best bang for your buck for a speaker

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
